name: HOMR
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Al Jean
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: An x-ray reveals a crayon lodged in Homer's brain. After the crayon is removed, Homer experiences a sudden surge in intelligence, making him closer to Lisa and isolated from his friends.
